text: You will find that which you have been looking for
Your ability for accomplishment will be followed by success!
A big fortune will descend upon you this year
True love will knock on your door this month
Don't worry, everything will be fine.
An unexpected vacation will introduce you to new horizons
You will stub your toe. On your other toe.
After failing school, you will trip on a banana peel
Your whole live has been a computer simulation, and it's time to reboot to install a Windows Update.
A very angry skunk will spray you after class.
You will divide by zero, and the universe will explode
